2S1.1.title: Laundering of Monetary Instruments; Engaging in Monetary Transactions in

baseOffenseQuestions.text: Did the defendant commit the underlying offense from which the laundered funds were derived (or would be accountable for it under §1B1.3(a)(1)(A))?
Can the offense level for the underlying offense be determined?

yesResult.description: Use the offense level for the underlying offense from which the laundered funds were derived

baseOffenseQuestions.text: What is the value of the laundered funds to determine the enhancement from §2B1.1?

yesResult.description: 8 plus the number of offense levels from §2B1.1 corresponding to the value of the laundered funds

noResult.description: 8 plus the number of offense levels from §2B1.1 corresponding to the value of the laundered funds

specificOffenseCharacteristics.text: Does subsection (a)(2) apply AND did the defendant know or believe that any of the laundered funds were proceeds of, or intended to promote: (i) controlled substance/listed chemical offense; (ii) crime of violence; or (iii) offense involving firearms, explosives, national security, or sexual exploitation of a minor?

options.label: Subsection (a)(2) applies AND defendant was in the business of laundering funds

specificOffenseCharacteristics.text: Does subsection (b)(2)(B) apply AND did the offense involve sophisticated laundering?
specificOffenseCharacteristics.condition: Only applies if subsection (b)(2)(B) applies (convicted under 18 U.S.C. § 1956)
